item.description:
Report X-2025010897

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-14
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED TO DOOR 35 WEARING PROPER PPE. PACKAGE WAS SITTING ON THE FLOOR OF THE TRAILER. RESPONDER USED DECICION TREE AND CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEETS TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
